janma shatha warsha purnaya sihipath karana athi gaurawaniya oba wahanseta thawath digukalak nirapadrithawa jiwathwimata awashya kayika ha manasika shakthiyath, chira jiwanayath theruwan saranin ha siyalu dewi rakawaranin labewayi meth sith peratuwa prarthana karami.mahinda rajapaksha shri lanka prajathanthrika samajawadi janarajaye janadhipathi sila waththan guna wanthan - punynyakeththan anuththaran thunna mewa mahabhanthan - buddha puththan nama mahansilayen menma gunayen piripun, pinkethak bandu wu buddha puthrayanan wahansa, oba wahanseta mama wandimi, pudami.
owuntath oona me tharagawaliya sarthakawa nima karannayi.

shri lanka kandayama panduwata paharadimata pamini awasthawe lakunu 121kata kadulu pahak dawi nawathawarak adu lakunu sankhyawata dayi yana thaththwayak pennum karaddi hayawana kadullata milinda siriwardhana (58) saha chamara kapugedara (40) pandu 99ka di lakunu 91k ras kale wati siti thaththwayen yam sahanadayi godaeemakata katayuthu karamini.
